review: We consulted the doctor for knee replacement surgery for my mom, and right from the initial consultation to post surgery care, Dr.Dinesh was very professional, kind and friendly. Always available for timely advice. The surgery experience was very good, and I would recommend Dr.Dinesh for all orthopaedic problems.

Doctor is good, staff is not helpful.Also, doctor is always busy and we had to wait longer time, I do not expect this in private hospital.Cordination between doctor and staff is very bad. Not a great experience.
